thread.title: Thalapathy61 first schedule over Nithya Menen finishes 80 percent of her portions - Tamil Movie News
thread.title_full: Thalapathy61 first schedule over Nithya Menen finishes 80 percent of her portions - Tamil Movie News

title: Thalapathy61 first schedule over Nithya Menen finishes 80 percent of her portions - Tamil Movie News
text: Vadivelu-Kovai Sarala return for Vijay The first schedule of shooting of Ilayathalapathy Vijay's 61st film directed by Atlee has been wrapped. The entire schedule has been shot in a sets erected by Art Director Muthuraj in ECR. The 1980s period portions of the film is said to be shot in this schedule. Many combination scenes of Vijay and Nithya Menen, a song and a fight scene have been shot in this schedule. It is said that 80% of Nithya Menen's portions in the film has been completed. The shooting of 'Thalapathy 61' is expected to resume for the second schedule on March 10, 2017 an that will also be in Chennai. Later the crew will shoot rest of the schedules in abroad locations.
